segments.pli: Saṃyutta Nikāya 44
segments.en: Linked Discourses 44

segments.pli: 1. Abyākatavagga
segments.en: 1. The Undeclared Points

segments.pli: 3. Paṭhamasāriputtakoṭṭhikasutta
segments.en: 3. With Sāriputta and Koṭṭhita (1st)

segments.pli: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca sāriputto, āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko bārāṇasiyaṃ viharanti isipatane migadāye.
segments.en: At one time Venerable Sāriputta and Venerable Mahākoṭṭhita were staying near Benares, in the deer park at Isipatana.

segments.pli: Atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā sāriputtena saddhiṃ sammodi.
segments.en: Then in the late afternoon, Venerable Mahākoṭṭhita came out of retreat, went to Venerable Sāriputta, and exchanged greetings with him.

segments.pli: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: When the greetings and polite conversation were over, he sat down to one side, and said to Sāriputta:

segments.pli: “Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso sāriputta, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
segments.en: “Reverend Sāriputta, does a Realized One exist after death?”

segments.pli: “Abyākataṃ kho etaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā:
segments.en: “Reverend, this has not been declared by the Buddha.”

segments.pli: ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
“Kiṃ panāvuso, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
segments.en: “Well then, does a Realized One not exist after death? …

segments.pli: “Etampi kho, āvuso, abyākataṃ bhagavatā:
‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
“Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
segments.en: Does a Realized One both exist and not exist after death? …

segments.pli: “Abyākataṃ kho etaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā:
‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
“Kiṃ panāvuso, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
segments.en: Does a Realized One neither exist nor not exist after death?”

segments.pli: “Etampi kho, āvuso, abyākataṃ bhagavatā:
segments.en: “This too has not been declared by the Buddha.”

segments.pli: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
“‘Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti iti puṭṭho samāno, ‘abyākataṃ kho etaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā—
segments.en: “Reverend, when asked these questions, you say that they have not been declared by the Buddha.

segments.pli: hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vadesi … pe …
‘kiṃ panāvuso, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti iti puṭṭho samāno:
‘etampi kho, āvuso, abyākataṃ bhagavatā—
neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vadesi.
Ko nu kho, āvuso, hetu, ko paccayo yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti?
segments.en: What’s the cause, what’s the reason why they have not been declared by the Buddha?”

segments.pli: “Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti kho, āvuso, rūpagatametaṃ.
segments.en: “Reverend, ‘does a Realized One exist after death?’ is included in form.

segments.pli: Na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, rūpagatametaṃ.
segments.en: ‘Does a Realized One not exist after death?’ is included in form.

segments.pli: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, rūpagatametaṃ.
segments.en: ‘Does a Realized One both exist and not exist after death?’ is included in form.

segments.pli: Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, rūpagatametaṃ.
segments.en: ‘Does a Realized One neither exist nor not exist after death?’ is included in form.

segments.pli: Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti kho, āvuso, vedanāgatametaṃ.
segments.en: ‘Does a Realized One exist after death?’ is included in feeling …

segments.pli: Na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, vedanāgatametaṃ.
Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, vedanāgatametaṃ.
Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, vedanāgatametaṃ.
Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti kho, āvuso, saññāgatametaṃ.
segments.en: perception …

segments.pli: Na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, saññāgatametaṃ.
Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, saññāgatametaṃ.
Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, saññāgatametaṃ.
Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti kho, āvuso, saṅkhāragatametaṃ.
segments.en: choices …

segments.pli: Na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, saṅkhāragatametaṃ.
Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, saṅkhāragatametaṃ.
Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, saṅkhāragatametaṃ.
Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti kho, āvuso, viññāṇagatametaṃ.
segments.en: consciousness.

segments.pli: Na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, viññāṇagatametaṃ.
segments.en: ‘Does a Realized One not exist after death?’ is included in consciousness.

segments.pli: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, viññāṇagatametaṃ.
segments.en: ‘Does a Realized One both exist and not exist after death?’ is included in consciousness.

segments.pli: Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, viññāṇagatametaṃ.
segments.en: ‘Does a Realized One neither exist nor not exist after death?’ is included in consciousness.

segments.pli: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, hetu ayaṃ paccayo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti.
segments.en: This is the cause, this is the reason why this has not been declared by the Buddha.”

segments.pli: Tatiyaṃ.

sections.title: At one time Venerable Sāriputta and Venerable Mahākoṭṭhita were…

suttaplex.blurb: Mahākoṭṭhita asks Sāriputta whether a Realized One exists after death. Sāriputta says that to answer this would be to get involved in the five aggregates, something that a Realized One is free from.
